html.p: This dashboard shows user logons. Click a row to get session details including individual process resource utilization.

table.title: User Activity
table.searchString: `xd_index` sourcetype=xendesktop:*:session SiteName="$SiteName$" UserName="$UserName$" UserName!="" MachineName="$server$" ApplicationsInUse="*$AppName$*" StartTime!="" | makemv delim=";" ApplicationsInUse | stats latest(UserName) AS UserName latest(ClientAddress) AS ClientAddress latest(ClientVersion) AS ClientVersion latest(_time) AS CurrentTime values(ApplicationsInUse) AS ApplicationsInUse BY StartTime MachineName | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S %Z" mktime(StartTime) | eval SessionDuration = tostring(CurrentTime - StartTime, "duration") | eval "Start Time" = strftime(StartTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | table UserName "Start Time" MachineName SessionDuration ApplicationsInUse ClientAddress ClientVersion StartTime CurrentTime | rename UserName AS "User Name" MachineName AS "Machine Name" ApplicationsInUse AS "Application(s)" ClientAddress AS "IP Address" ClientVersion AS "Client Version"
